ehi (03) upa waganthiyehi sandahan kara aththe winishchayakarawarayaku iwath kirime sampurna karya patipatiya parlimenthuwa wisin nithi magin ho sthawara niyoga magin ho sakas kala yuthu bawaya.(3) upa waganthiya“ee yojana sammathaya sammatha kirime karya patipatiya da athulu wa ewani yojanawak idiripath kirima sambandhawa wu da choditha wishama pawathma ho abalathawa wimarshanaya kirima saha oppu kirima sambandhawa wu da winishchayakarawarayata paudgalikawa ma ho niyojithayaku magin ho peni sitimata saha karunu dakwa sitimata athi ayithiya sambandhawa wu da siyalu karana sandaha parlimenthuwa wisin nithi magin ho sthawara niyoga magin ho widhiwidhana salaswiya yuththeya.”

sama wasarakama ape්ral sita okthobar dakwa wu warakan kalaya thula thama dainika jiwanopayan salasa ganimata udgatha wana dushkarathawanta piliyamak illima me dhiwarayinge ekama balaporoththuwa wiya.sandaha owun illa sitiye swabhawika dhiwara thotupolak wana induruwa kayikawala pradeshayata “nanguram polak” laba dena lesayi.sunamiyen thama niwasa, oru, bottu, madal, aadi dhiwara aampanna pamanak nowa, andiwatha pawa ahimi karagath me pradeshaye dhiwara prajawa yalith swauthsahayen thama huru purudu jiwanopayatama yomu karaganne eya hara wenath wikalpayak nowu heyini.“siyak nanguram polawal” idi kirime wyapruthiya arambaune “thotupola aruna” nam wu dhiwara prajawata setha salasana widhimath wada satahanak washayeni.me pradeshaye dhiwara janathawa yanthamin ho aswasillak labuwe, ema wada satahana yatathe lankawa pura idiwana nanguram polawal siyen ekak induruwe kayikawala pradeshayata labena bawa nishchithawama dana ganimen pasuwaya.nanguram pola aashi්rathawa, dal sakasime madhyasthanayak, saniparakshaka eekakayak, thel pirawum sthanayak athulu godabim wyapruthiyakda aarambha kirimata salasum karini.
